text: Ara jannatabasira agunera basindadera deke balabe -- ''amara niscaya'i peyechi amadera prabhu amadera kache ya oyada karechilena ta satya, tomara'o ki tabe tomadera prabhu ya oyada karechilena ta satya peyecha?’’ Tara balabe -- ''ham.’’ Takhana janaika mu'ojjina tadera madhye ghosana karabe -- ''allah‌ra dhikkara hoka duracaridera upare
